We've read your feedback and we understand that there is room for improvement.

The good news is that here at Three we've taken the pledge...

When stuff sucks, make it right!

That's why we're launching a new app testing community for our customers. We really care about your feedback, so much so that we want you to help drive our vision.

Join the community to get early access and help us #makeitright

Now you can send Jackson emoticons to your friends-or skip seeing Jackson altogether if you’ve had enough of him!

Pay Monthly customers can now also top-up a friend or Pay As You Go account using Three.co.uk.

Hello from the Three app team. We hope you've been enjoying using the app, but we're always working on making it better. Here's what we've done in this release:

* You can now delete notifications in our improved notification tab
* Some UI tweaks
* Bug fixes
* Improve pull-to-refresh when VoiceOver is enabled

We hope you like it. There's more to come soon.

2017 is here and the Three app is better than ever!

The latest build includes:
- UI improvements and bug fixes when viewing your bills
- Our first in-app video tutorial. Learn how to transfer your number to Three
- Fixed an issue where some customers were loading onto a white screen
- General bug fixes to improve reliability

Happy new year from Three.

We've been busy - now you can:

- Manage your roaming settings in a jiffy.
- See the payment date for your upcoming bills.
- Move your number to Three even faster.

Oh, and we even squashed a few bugs on the way.

Hello jet setter - check useful roaming info right from the app.

No surprises - check your extra charges for any month, just go to the Bill tab and pull down to refresh.

Ready to upgrade - see when your contract ends and when you can upgrade. Head to the Plan tab and, you guessed it, pull down to refresh.

Spring clean - we've had a clear-out, and thrown a few bugs out while we were at it.

- We'll give you a nudge when your bill's due & more, if you like.
- We've made Top-up even easier.
- Get notifications when you want (not when you don't).
- Easier to use, simpler to navigate.
- Making recommendations based on what you use - running out of texts all the time? Three app will suggest an Add-on to help.
- The usual bug squishing bonanza.

- Made it easier for Pay Monthly users to buy Add-ons.
- Better, nicer notifications.
- Spraying Summer bugs all over the place.

You know that annoying thing where Three app showed a few of you 0MB data and didn't check your internet Add-ons? Fixed it. Also, sorry.

- Made navigating the app better.
- Neatened things up so they're easier to understand.
- Now when something goes wrong, we'll explain what happened.

So, what's new? Glad you asked!

- Pay Monthly customers can get a clear idea of their data usage every month.
- We've made things a little easier to find, and easier to read.
- We've fixed a few bugs here and there.

So, what's new? Glad you asked!

We've made things easier to find and read, and while we were at it made sure that Pay Monthly users can clearly see how many minutes and texts they've used.

Plus, you've guessed it, we've been bug hunting, so expect a smoother running Three app.

Enjoy.

New, nerdier Three app.

We've racked our brains and made some smart changes to Three app, just for you.

We've added diagnostics which make it easier to fix your problems, and as usual, got rid of some bugs (except bookworms, of course). You'd better catch up and update your app.

We’ve made Three app better to use and easier to understand. You can check out your Bills, Plan and Going Abroad tabs to see how we’ve fixed them right up.

Now you can get more done with less confusion.

It's a brand new year, so we've got some brand new features for you. Here's what we've been working on to get through the January Blues:

We've made bill breakdowns clearer.
Use our new Call Checker page to see if a number will cost you to call, and how much.
Confused about Wi-Fi Calling? We've added a page to explain it.
We'll give you a little reminder to switch Wi-Fi back on if we need you to switch it off.

And last but not least - we've snuck a (super addictive) game in there. Bye-bye boredom.

We’ve made a little pick’n’mix of updates this time round, from things that you should hopefully never notice (like some bug fixes, and an easier way to troubleshoot the app) to stuff that we DO hope you’ll notice, like rearranging all your billing options under one tidy tab.

We’ve made a little pick’n’mix of updates this time round, from things that you should hopefully never notice (like some bug fixes, and an easier way to troubleshoot the app) to stuff that we DO hope you’ll notice, like rearranging all your billing options under one tidy tab.

We’ve made a little pick’n’mix of updates this time round, from things that you should hopefully never notice (like some bug fixes, and an easier way to troubleshoot the app) to stuff that we DO hope you’ll notice, like rearranging all your billing options under one tidy tab.

First off, we’ve made the usual tweaks here and there – a few bug fixes, tech updates, and a little bit of tidying up. We’ve also made it much simpler for you to upgrade from the app.

And now to the good stuff – We’ve improved the Upcoming bill section, to let you properly see the details of your next bill before it comes out. Also, you can now use the app to book a free Discovery Session, to help you, your business or your community learn more about digital tech. Did we mention it’s free?

Also, you can now use the app to book a free Discovery Session, to help you, your business or your community learn more about digital tech. Did we mention it’s free?

It's hot outside and we have some hot new updates to share with you! In our latest release, we've continued making some more general tweaks to the app, including some general bug fixes, diagnostics improvements, and more tidying up.

Most notably, we've made numerous improvements to the Change Price Plan journey, and personalised the Add-on options available to you, based on your account type and plan. Additionally, if you're looking to port your number from a Pay As You Go plan to a Pay Monthly plan, we've got you covered with our brand new form.

It's hot outside and we have some hot new updates to share with you! In our latest release, we've continued making some more general tweaks to the app, including some general bug fixes, diagnostics improvements, and more tidying up.

Most notably, we've made numerous improvements to the Change Price Plan journey, and personalised the Add-on options available to you, based on your account type and plan. Additionally, if you're looking to port your number from a Pay As You Go plan to a Pay Monthly plan, we've got you covered with our brand new form.

It's hot outside and we have some hot new updates to share with you! In our latest release, we've continued making some more general tweaks to the app, including some general bug fixes, diagnostics improvements, and more tidying up.

Most notably, we've made numerous improvements to the Change Price Plan journey, and personalised the Add-on options available to you, based on your account type and plan. Additionally, if you're looking to port your number from a Pay As You Go plan to a Pay Monthly plan, we've got you covered with our brand new form.

In our latest release, we've redesigned the journey for changing your price plan. This change enhances the look and feel of the journey and makes it easier to boost your allowances by changing your plan.

We've also added an international Add-ons section so that you can easily identify Add-ons to use when you're travelling abroad.

Additionally, we've made some small improvements to the diagnostics flow, and made a host of other bug fixes and performance tweaks.

We’ve jazzed up the app, with a whole lotta new colours and styles, and even brand new fonts. We love it, and we hope you will too.

That’s not all though – we’ve also extended the Offers tab, to give you better access to all the available offers for existing customers.

Plus, as usual, we’ve done a little bit of spring cleaning, little techy fixes, and a few bug removals.

We’ve been super busy making improvements, such as adding in sparkly new app and notification icons, as well as tool-tips. We’ve also cleaned the place up by updating terms like Go Roam and Unlimited to make things easier for you. Plus, we've started refreshing Add-ons, and spruced up a few areas with the new style that we introduced last time. It just keeps getting better!

As always, we've fixed a few annoying bugs that we've found to make sure everything’s running like clockwork.

We've added a nifty tool for pay monthly customers. We'll estimate your usage and give you a nudge if we think you’re going to run out of data this month, you can then decide if you want to get an Add-on.

This release we've made some nifty changes to the more tab, that will make your life a whole lot easier finding the features you need.

We've also given some love to our Pay As You Go users with a new and improved top-up method, meaning you can now buy an Add-on straight away, saving you time from having to do this after you’ve topped up.

This is a small release to fix some add-ons issues that Pay-as-you-go customers were reporting. They're all looking great now, why not take a look?
We've introduced One Day Boost to our selection of pay monthly Add-ons, for when you need a quick hit of data. Plus some quick fixes to some minor issues.

It's here. We've finally done it. From this update, the app will now fully work whilst connected to a WiFi network. No more turning WiFi on and off just to quickly check your allowance. Phew.

This also means you can now save and manage multiple My3 accounts all from one device. Pretty handy for those with kids or businesses.

You can do all this quickly and easily, by using our shiny new login pages to enter your My3 account details. If you've not registered with My3 before, you can do that here too.

We have fixed a bug where some users with special characters in their password were unable to log in. You're good to go again.

In this update, we’ve made changing your price plan even easier, head to the Plan tab, then Change your price plan to see details of all available plans.

And you can now see if your Add-on’s active or pending. Head to the Plan tab to check it out.

In this update, we’re bringing back average data usage to help you keep track of how much data you’re using.
And with some tweaks to the Bills tab, you can now find a full breakdown of any Payforit charges.
We’ve made some security changes too, and have introduced double email verification. That means that when you register for the Three app, you’ll need to enter your email address twice.
And you can now join our Three Live broadcasts directly from the app, just head to the More tab.
